original_title: The Twenty-One Lives of Billy The Kid
overview: Shot in the abandoned buildings of Gary, Indiana and the cornfields of Western Illinois, The Twenty-One Lives of Billy the Kid presents a fractured historical narrative without any real protagonist, one in which the titular character goes mostly unseen - Billy the Kid as the always-off-screen assailant, as a ghostâ€™s laugh, as a shadow on the road.
title: The Twenty-One Lives of Billy The Kid
